name: My Love Slider
description:
Test your reaction and agility in this cute love themed sliding and matching game, featuring three different and addictive modes. Use angelic power-ups to help you along, and play through numerous fun packed levels as you try your hardest to master the game. Beat your friend's scores on the leader boards and share your successes with them on Facebook!

♡ Brilliant visuals, which look absolutely stunning on the new HD iPads and iPhone 5.
♡ Love theme with lots of cute visuals.
♡ Angelic power ups.
♡ Three uniquely different modes; Arcade, Zen and Score Panic.
♡ Each mode is easy to learn, yet hard to master.
♡ Helpful hint feature or rotate the board if you get really stuck.
♡ Separate leader boards for each mode and a combined board to show who's really is the champion!
♡ Climb the leader boards and share your success with your friends on Facebook.
♡ Progress is saved in every mode - try out the different modes without losing your saves.

ARCADE MODE
Fast paced matching fun is on offer in the Arcade mode. Test your skill and reflexes as you race to complete the level before the timer overpowers you. Keep an eye out for the 'Extra Time' power up - you're going to need it!

SCORE PANIC
Can you reach the target score before your time runs out? The target score is increased after every level making this mode more and more challenging. Just don't panic!

ZEN
Relax and chill in Zen mode, without a timer to harry and panic, you can lay back and focus on an addictive, never ending game of gem match. We even lower the music a couple of notches!

GAME PLAY

Match 3 games are puzzle games. You need to match 3 or more objects by sliding rows or columns with your finger. Matched pieces are removed from the board and new pieces dropped back onto the board. The object is to clear the board and advance to the next level.

If you're unsure of the next move then press the hint button for some help. The board will darken and an arrow will show you a row or column to slide, with a starting piece and a target piece. Slide the starting piece in the direction of the arrow, until it arrives at the slot previously occupied by the target - you now got a match! Alternatively, you can rotate a quadrant of the board by pressing one of the rotate buttons that are situated in each corner of the board.

Matching 4 or more pieces can trigger the spawning of power ups with special abilities, helping you clear larger areas of the board:

SPECIAL PIECES

♡ Cool As A Ninja
This laid-back cherub wants to help YOU! Double tapping her will unleash her cold fury, causing her to destroy all pieces that match her colour.

♡ Multi-Colored Muse
This colourful cherub is a special piece that can be matched with ANY other coloured piece.

♡ Burning Love!
This bad boy gives out an immense boiling heat which is capable of totally destroying all pieces in the same vertical or horizontal line.

♡ Jilted Lover!
She is absolutely fuming and will destroy all the pieces in her immediate area. Double tap to release the anger and blow her past loves to smithereens!

♡ Extra Time!
Double tap to pause the timer for a short while. Hurry though, it doesn't last forever!

♡ Heart Sniper
Don't feel left out - double tap the bow to destroy all pieces to it's left!

♡ Junior Heart Sniper
Right On! Double tap the bow to destroy all pieces to it's right.

♡ Cold Hearted Disintegrator
This cool dude packs a punch! He destroys all pieces within the same horizontal line as him, leaving behind a trail of broken hearts!

♡ Warm Hearted Vaporiser
Whoa! This little guy contains pent-up passion, which ZAPS anything in the same vertical line as him.
